column4: is there any app for ubuntu that can recover deleted files that were formated over, etc?
or at least one that can try to recover?
: 'giis' is a tool that can sometimes recover recently deleted files from an ext2 or ext3 filesystem

: no problem and good luck :) The most important thing to do once you've accidentally deleted a file is to stop writing to the disk that the file was on immediately. That will increase your chances of the tool working.
